long_description: Delivering a sleek look for light fitness and casual use, Vibram FiveFingers Alitza shoes make a great choice for your first pair of minimalist footwear. Feet will flex and breathe easily in the stretchy polyester uppers, which move with you and sit low on your feet; synthetic suede overlays offer light protection and structure. Straps over midfoot keep shoes on, and they offer additional support. Individual toe slots separate and encourage strengthening of toes and can enhance balance, agility and range of motion. AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment helps deter odors. Thin 2mm EVA insoles offer light cushioning underfoot and good ground sensation. 3.5mm nonmarking Vibram TC-1 rubber outsoles provide slip-resistant traction and flexibility. Recommended for light fitness and casual wear. To allow your feet to adapt to using different muscles, begin use of these shoes gradually and increase over time. Vibram FiveFingers Alitza shoes are machine washable; air dry only. To determine size, stand with heels against a wall and measure from the wall to the tip of the longest toe on each foot; use the longer of the 2 lengths with the size chart.
short_description: Delivering a sleek look for light fitness and casual use, Vibram FiveFingers Alitza shoes make a great choice for your first pair of minimalist footwear.
